GSD.description:
ARM: mmp: Fix failure to remove sram device

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.19 by commit 56f25cad7d3e3a55612d9596551ad436f8647317. For more details please see the references link.
